title: Plate, "Hexagon", 1948
markings: Marks: On underside: (in Russian) "A. Vorobyevsky / November 1948 / Hexagon" hand-painted in blue overglaze
provenance: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection
creditline: The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds
description: Circular; painted in blue, with some gilding, in the center a stylized flower in reserve, around the border six panels alternating with stylized animals and flowers

tombstone.epitaph:
Plate, "Hexagon", 1948.
1948. porcelain, enamel, gilding. The Henry and Ludmilla Shapiro Collection; Partial gift and partial purchase through the Decorative Arts Association Acquisition and Smithsonian Collections Acquisition Program Funds. 1989-41-33.
